greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Product_{d|n, d = x^k, with x,k > 1} prime(A052409(d)-1).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences computed from exponents in factorization of n
program: (PARI) A294875(n) = { my(m=1,e); fordiv(n,d, if(d>1, e = ispower(d); if(e>1, m *= prime(e-1)))); m; };
xref: Cf. A046951, A061704, A091050 (some of the matched sequences).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 11 2017
